name: Deific Obedience
description: Your reverence for a deity is so great that daily prayer and minor sacrifices grant you special boons.
prerequisites: Knowledge (religion) 3 ranks, must worship a deity
benefit: Each deity requires a different daily obedience, but all obediences take no more than 1 hour per day to perform. Once youâ€™ve performed the obedience, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the Obedience entry for the god to whom you performed the obedience.
